about_the_game:
This is the trial version of Hack the Babel Inc. It is a roguelike puzzle game developed with the aim of creating a puzzle experience that changes the way you solve it each time you play.
The game can be experienced up to the second stage, with two playable characters and 60 items.
The story is a prequel to the main game, and the full version will have a new storyline and balance.
You can send bug reports and play reports from within the game (though it will jump to an external URL). We would appreciate it if you could help us improve the game content.
detailed_description:

The game can be experienced up to the second stage, with two playable characters and 60 items.
The story is a prequel to the main game, and the full version will have a new storyline and balance.
You can send bug reports and play reports from within the game (though it will jump to an external URL). We would appreciate it if you could help us improve the game content.
name: Hack the Babel Inc. Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This is a demo version of Hack the Babel Inc. and a prequel to the full version. Experience a puzzle that changes every time how you play with a wide variety of items!
